headline: New Jersey American Water Signs Agreement to Purchase South Orange Village Water System
summary: CAMDEN, N.J., March 06, 2025--New Jersey American Water announced today it signed an agreement to acquire the water system in South Orange Village for $19.7 million. This announcement follows a referendum vote in November of 2024 in which 62% of South Orange voters approved the sale of the system. The South Orange water system serves approximately 5,000 customer connections.

headline: American Water Charitable Foundation Provides Grant to Support Kentucky Communities Affected by Floods
summary: CAMDEN, N.J., March 06, 2025--The American Water Charitable Foundation, a philanthropic non-profit organization established by American Water (NYSE: AWK), the largest regulated water and wastewater utility company in the U.S., announced today that it is providing a $10,000 grant to the American Red Cross to support communities impacted by heavy rains and flash floods in Kentucky.

headline: Global Water Resources Q4 Earnings Lag Estimates, Revenues Rise Y/Y
summary: GWRS' fourth-quarter earnings miss estimates. The company continues to add new customers to its existing base.
